abstract: What’s the difference between consumers spending money on a fancy trip to Las Vegas in order to jumpstart economic activity, and Wells Fargo doing the same thing?
snippet: What’s the difference between consumers spending money on a fancy trip to Las Vegas in order to jumpstart economic activity, and Wells Fargo doing the same thing?

headline.main: Are Junkets Good for the Economy?
